sourcesContent:
function ContributionsTable({ contributions, summary }) { return (
{contributions && contributions.contributors && (

Campaign finance information for the {contributions.cycle} election cycle:

Cash on Hand {summary.cashOnHand}
Raised This Cycle {summary.total}
Total Debt {summary.debt}
Spent this Cycle {summary.spent}
Next Election {summary.nextElection}
Last Updated {summary.lastUpdated}
{contributions && contributions.contributors && contributions.contributors.map((contributor, index) => (
Contributor {contributor['@attributes'].org_name}
Amount {new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 0, }).format(contributor['@attributes'].total)}
))}
)}
); } export default ContributionsTable;
